attributes.action: Csa should take into account days instead of just nights when assessing how much to pay for your child
attributes.additional_details: Fathers and mothers  pay for how many nights per week their child stays over but the csa do not care how many days you spend with them. This should be changed to take into account the time you spend with your child not just how many nights they stay over as this means you pay twice once to the other parent then the expense of having your child for these days. We should have fair csa assessment
